name: Luna (itch) (femme.fatales)
description:
Luna needs your help! Her collar broke, and now she can't find her way home. Explore the alleyways around her home to find the pieces of her collar and help her return to her home.

This game was mostly made in the 48-hour period of the Global Game Jam 2021, whose theme was "Lost and Found." After the jam, we debugged the game some and wanted to share the finished project with the world!

Credits:
